programme.title: World's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: The case of Charles Ng and Leonard Lake, who raped, tortured and murdered a number of victims at their cabin in California during the mid-1980s.(n)

programme.title: The British
programme.desc: The development of London during the Victorian era, as the city at the heart of the British empire rapidly expanded - and social divisions became increasingly pronounced. The programme explores the grandeur of the period, including the building of the Crystal Palace, as well as sharp rises in vice and crime that prompted outrage among reformers including Charles Dickens and Josephine Butler. There is also a look at how football became increasingly popular.

programme.title: Storm City
programme.desc: Four-part documentary in which Ben Fogle explores the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out what happens when man is pitted against the power of Mother Nature. In the final programme, he discovers how earthquakes wreak so much havoc.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Teenager Logan starts work as an apprentice deck-hand, while landlady Pat recalls fond memories from her life in Brixham.

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: While President Bartlet is on a trip to Portland, Leo holds the fort and deals with a crisis in the Persian Gulf involving a foreign tanker crew suspected of smuggling contraband oil. Josh handles a bill supporting same-sex marriage and Sam and Toby prepare a speech on education reform.

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: President Bartlet faces a dilemma over the fate of asylum-seeking Chinese immigrants and Toby seeks a ministerial role for Leo's sister. CJ flounders as she struggles to decide which Thanksgiving turkey receives a presidential pardon. Political drama, starring Martin Sheen and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Chase returns to the hospital after his stabbing, but he blurs the line between doctor and patient when a cloistered nun's condition worsens. Meanwhile, House and Taub turn the corridors into a playground by playing a series of pranks on each other. Medical drama, starring Hugh Laurie and Jesse Spencer.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Dominika and House research each other's families as they try to convince US immigration their marriage is genuine. Meanwhile, the team competes to become second in command, and a relationship counsellor collapses during a speaking engagement, before displaying some strange behaviour. Medical drama, starring Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: A bride disappears at her wedding, leading to suspicions of kidnapping. However, Malone believes clues to the truth lie in the relationship between the newlyweds.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Two girls are attacked and a third is raped on a local college campus, and when Danny investigates, evidence suggests the culprit is a member of an elite fraternity, and the son of an Argentinian diplomat. Meanwhile, Sydney realises that Jamie is more dedicated to the police force than to her, and Frank is forced to question the appropriateness of his relationship with Kelly. Crime drama, starring Donnie Wahlberg.

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: The President takes part in a chaotic live television conference with thousands of children - and as if things weren't hectic enough, he also has a fire in a Russian nuclear silo to worry about. Martin Sheen and Robe Lowe star.

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: An Air Force pilot disappears with an F-16, Donna becomes intent on wangling an invitation to the Congressional Christmas party and Josh meets members of the American Trauma Victims Association. Meanwhile, Sam deals with an errant energy secretary who contradicts Bartlet. Drama, starring Martin Sheen, with a guest appearance by cellist Yo-Yo Ma.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: The doctor receives a shock when his mother arrives unexpectedly at the hospital with her latest partner. Meanwhile, the team battles to save a blind man who has been struck down by a mysterious illness while preparing to propose to his girlfriend. Guest starring Billy Connolly.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: The team deals with an army veteran charged with treason after leaking classified information, but he refuses to be treated until he and his brother are given information about their late father. Meanwhile, Adams recruits Wilson to plan an intervention when she suspects House may be ill. Medical drama, starring Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom investigates the rape of a casino worker, and discovers the perpetrator's DNA matches that found during inquiries into an unsolved case on the same stretch of road a year before. Meanwhile, Sara drowns her sorrows after missing out on a promotion, but ends up being pulled over while driving under the influence.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny searches for Ricky Russo, the son of former crime boss Happy Jack, who is suspected of killing an off-duty policeman during a diamond robbery. However, Henry suspects the investigation is targeting the wrong man, and decides to see if Happy Jack can shed any more light on the case. Meanwhile, Erin is confounded by her teenage daughter's petulant behaviour. Crime drama, starring Tom Selleck, Donnie Wahlberg and Len Cariou, with Dominic Chianese (The Sopranos).

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in King's Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughter's safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyn's death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In King's Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: High Maintenance
programme.desc: The Guy offers advice to regular customer Marty after his bike is stolen. Elsewhere, Darby finds ways to unnerve and bewilder strangers.(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina and the team attend the funeral of a Supreme Court Justice, while Amy works on securing a place for Selina's presidential library.(n)

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Avon puts a bounty on Omar for stealing his drug stash and McNulty and Bunk reinvestigate the murder of a woman that may be linked to Barksdale's crew. Those caught in the police raid on the low-rises refuse to give up their superiors, and dealer Bodie escapes from juvenile detention. Drama, starring Dominic West and Wood Harris.(n)

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: The detail receives cloned pagers to get a lead on the Barksdale gang's plans, but has trouble cracking a code used by the dealers - until a solution arrives from an unlikely source. Stringer warns D'Angelo there might be an informant in his crew, Carver and Herc track down Bodie, and Omar makes McNulty and Greggs an offer. Drama, starring Dominic West, Idris Elba and Larry Gilliard Jr.(n)

programme.title: Life Itself: Special
programme.desc: A look at the latest Sky Cinema Original film - a multi-generational tale of life, loss and love, starring Oscar Isaac, Olivia Wilde, Olivia Cooke and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: The President takes part in a chaotic live television conference with thousands of children - and as if things weren't hectic enough, he also has a fire in a Russian nuclear silo to worry about. Martin Sheen and Robe Lowe star.(n)

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: An Air Force pilot disappears with an F-16, Donna becomes intent on wangling an invitation to the Congressional Christmas party and Josh meets members of the American Trauma Victims Association. Meanwhile, Sam deals with an errant energy secretary who contradicts Bartlet. Drama, starring Martin Sheen, with a guest appearance by cellist Yo-Yo Ma.(n)

programme.title: Storm City
programme.desc: Documentary in which Ben Fogle explores the devastating impact of extreme weather, finding out what happens when man is pitted against the power of Mother Nature. He begins with the chaos caused by snow and ice, using real-life studies - such as Montreal being shut down by a fierce ice storm in 1998 - and sharing incredible stories of survival. He then subjects a specially built test house to an avalanche, one of the world's deadliest natural forces.(n)

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixham's annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations, however, and decides to reminisce about past race days instead. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead.(n)

programme.title: The British
programme.desc: How Britain changed during the reign of the Tudor and Stuart monarchs. The programme explores the battles that established England as one of the world's leading naval powers and delves into Henry VIII's feud with the Catholic Church, revealing how he tried to silence dissenting voices. Contributors including Helen Mirren and Ben Kingsley also discover how literature from the period sowed the seeds of revolution, and learn why a riot organised from a prison cell laid the foundations for civil war.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist and film-maker explores the many varieties of plant life housed at the Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew, west London, and explains what they reveal about the natural world and the development of life on Earth. He begins inside the establishment's Palm House, whose climate has been engineered to simulate conditions found in rainforests, charting the evolution of plants that grow in the world's wettest regions and investigating how flowering plants spread across the globe so rapidly.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist explores how the plants at Kew Gardens change through the seasons and demonstrates the surprising properties of several species, including the predatory pond-dwelling bladderwort utricularia and a fungus that appears to be capable of mind control. He also discusses the largest single organism on the planet, visits the world's biggest flower and explains how plants and insects can communicate using scents and music.(n)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist concludes his exploration of the Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew, west London, by examining plants that have evolved to minimise their dependence on water, enabling them to survive in the world's driest environments. He witnesses a cactus blooming at midnight, tells the story of the spectacular flowering of the Agave franzosinii, and visits the Millennium Seed Bank, a facility designed to save plants from future extinction.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A teenage girl dies in a house fire, and the team discovers she had previously written an article exposing the school athletics team's shady initiation rituals, rousing suspicion that she was killed in retaliation. Meanwhile, Grissom uncovers bitter rivalry in the world of competitive word games. Crime drama, starring William Petersen and Marg Helgenberger.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom, Catherine and Nick investigate the killing of a cop during an annual law enforcement race. Meanwhile, Sara and Warrick are called to a hotel room where two other officers have been found dead in an incident that could either be murder or a suicide pact. Both cases are complicated by the fact that most of the suspects are also members of the force.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: A rollercoaster car comes off the tracks and lands in a car park, killing six people. Sara examines the rail and finds the incident was an act of sabotage. The case becomes more complicated with the discovery that one of the apparent victims actually died 16 hours before the disaster. Meanwhile, Warrick and Catherine investigate the murder of a 13-year-old girl.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Catherine's father becomes the prime suspect in the murder of two gamblers known to have cheated several of his casinos out of a small fortune. Meanwhile, Sara finds out Grissom has recommended Nick for the promotion she wanted. Guest starring Maury Chaykin and Eddie Kaye Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: The team searches for a youngster who disappeared on her way to school, talking to possible suspects ranging from her godfather to the local mayor. A day later the youngster's best friend also vanishes - but fortunately a collection of videos provides the key to cracking the case.(n)

programme.title: Without a Trace

Heather ran into complications during her first pregnancy and had to deliver twins at 24 weeks. They pulled through, but cerebral palsy and other issues have meant she is now a full-time carer to them both. What Del does not know is that they are planning to have him killed as a way of faking the godfather's death to help him escape being sent to prison. Feature-length episode of the comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst, with a cameo appearance by Bee Gee Barry Gibb.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Raquel invites her estranged parents around for dinner, and Del-Boy is keen to make an impression - but a mix-up with the gravy boat puts a damper on proceedings. However, things soon take a turn for the better when Del's `father-in-law' finds an old watch among the Trotters' junk, which he claims could net them a pretty packet at auction. But nothing can quite prepare them for the shock they have in store. The final part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.

But when Alia returns from the capital with his domineering sister-in-law Aunty Noor, it looks like his dodgy scam is in danger of being exposed to Mrs Khan. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson takes the BMW M5 for a spin to give his opinions on the model, and the presenters get dangerous as they try Russian roulette road-testing, in which they turn chauffeur for supposedly drunk drivers, reviewing their passenger's car in the process of taking them home. There is a debate about the merits of three hatchbacks - the Renault Megane, Vauxhall Astra VXR and Volkswagen Golf GTi - and broadcaster Chris Evans is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond celebrates the 40th anniversary of the Ferrari Daytona by taking one back to its spiritual home - the Italian Riviera - before trying to beat James May and a powerboat in a race from Portofino to St Tropez. Back in the UK, Jeremy Clarkson tests the BMW M3 saloon and compares it with the Lexus IS-F. Grand Designs presenter Kevin McCloud is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Jay Leno's Garage
programme.desc: Jay meets NASCAR star Joey Logano, and explores autonomous driving in a Tesla.

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Reality TV show following the exploits of eccentric master fabricator Steve Darnell, who invites cameras into his workshop as he builds customised cars from junk.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team takes a look at off-road models and test-drives the Bentley Flying Spur. There is also an attempt to drive a Jeep across a lake, a comparison of petrol and diesel-fuelled BMW 5 series vehicles, and Davina McCall is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May ask whether the Eastern Bloc countries ever made a good car, and Richard Hammond assesses the performance of German sports model the Veritas. The Ford Fiesta is also put through its paces in a stringent road test, and Mayor of London Boris Johnson is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank look for bargains in the collection of a former pawn shop owner, and receive good news about one of their purchases from a museum.

programme.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
programme.desc: A police pursuit results in a car being driven the wrong way up the M1. Reports emerge of two youths on mopeds threatening a man with a knife.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Stephen Fry asks Alan Davies, Jeremy Hardy, Barry Cryer and Jeremy Clarkson for more interesting answers on subjects including Birmingham, Bhutan and baldness in the mind-boggling quiz show.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More Old News for You
programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc hosts an extended edition of the satirical current affairs quiz from December 2016, with Citizen Khan star Adil Ray and Conservative MP Jacob Rees-Mogg joining captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the week's news.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Rich Hall, Josie Lawrence and John Sessions join regular panellist Alan Davies and host Stephen Fry, providing interesting answers to questions on butterflies, blackberries and Bernards.(n)

programme.title: Would I Lie to You
programme.desc: Olympic cycling gold-medallist Chris Hoy, impressionist Ronni Ancona, writer and producer Danny Wallace and sports presenter Gabby Logan join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Hosted by Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: Would I Lie to You
programme.desc: Fashionista Trinny Woodall, actor Reece Shearsmith, West End star Michael Ball and critic Charlie Brooker join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Hosted by Rob Brydon.(n)

programme.title: Special Forces - Ultimate Hell Week
programme.desc: Andrew Flintoff presents a show in which super-fit contestants must go through the gruelling training regimes of six elite military forces from around the world. In the first episode, the contestants, including a former professional boxer and a World Coal Carrying Champion, are put through their paces by Ray and Woodie, two former US Navy Seals operatives.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Arnie's Greatest Ever Stunts
programme.desc: Actor and former Governor of California Arnold Schwarzenegger presents a countdown of the most spectacular stunts ever committed to film. The Terminator star famously insisted on performing many of his own stunts during his Hollywood action-man heyday, and here, he highlights the achievements of fellow stars whose efforts produced thrilling set-pieces on-screen. However, Arnie does not limit himself to high-octane antics from the silver screen. He also showcases stand-alone feats, such as Jean Claude Van Damme's daring splits manoeuvre between two moving trucks, and Felix Baumgartner's free fall to Earth from the stratosphere. Includes commentary from fans, comedians, stunt coordinators and the daredevils themselves.(n)

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The duo travel to London, where they consider buying a rare motorbike and a telephone box with a risque history.(n)

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank get behind the wheel of the original Batmobile from the 1960s TV series Batman, and pay a visit to Grizzly Adams actor Dan Haggerty's treasure-filled California home.(n)

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike Wolfe and Frank Fritz are in seventh heaven when Cheap Trick guitarist Rick Nielsen opens the doors to his private rock 'n' roll warehouse.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team takes a look at off-road models and test-drives the Bentley Flying Spur. There is also an attempt to drive a Jeep across a lake, a comparison of petrol and diesel-fuelled BMW 5 series vehicles, and Davina McCall is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May pay tribute to Saab, the Swedish car manufacturer that created several successful models since the late 1940s, but has now ceased production. Richard Hammond takes the passenger's seat in a Skoda rally car that races a rocket-propelled flying man, and actor Matt Smith gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car. Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series.(n)

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: The boys get an antique snow bus that has been abandoned to the elements for 10 years back on the trails.(n)

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: When the only trail groomer in town breaks down on the `snowmobile highway', the boys are called out to do some trail-side repairs.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Elysian Park in Los Angeles is turned into an obstacle-littered course for the day as 70 teams of adrenaline junkies put their gravity-powered contraptions to the test.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The competing teams' motorless vehicles use gravity as their only form of propulsion in the Belgian capital of Brussels.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond compete in a land race from Resolute, Canada, to the North Pole in their most ambitious challenge to date. Pitting horse power against dog power they travel 450 miles across mountainous land masses and jagged sea ice at temperatures as low as minus 65C.(n)

programme.title: Would I Lie to You
programme.desc: Olympic cycling gold-medallist Chris Hoy, impressionist Ronni Ancona, writer and producer Danny Wallace and sports presenter Gabby Logan join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. programme.title: Would I Lie to You

Rob Brydon presents.(n)

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Gary Lineker hosts an extended edition of the satirical quiz as guests including comedian Jon Richardson join team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the week's news stories.(n)

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sara Pascoe, Colin Lane and Jimmy Carr join regular panellist Alan Davies and host Sandi Toksvig for an unconventional look at the theme `Opposites'. During the course of the show, the panellists find out how to sort the sheep from the goats, discover the opposite of Tarzan, and meet the telescope that points straight through the Earth. As ever, correctness and even intelligence go out of the window, as the fiendishly difficult questions lead to points being awarded for the answers its questionmaster finds most interesting, as opposed to correct.(n)

programme.title: Hypothetical
programme.desc: Guz Khan, Cariad Lloyd, David O'Doherty and Sara Pascoe are posed increasingly absurd hypothetical situations. Hosted by Josh Widdicombe and James Acaster. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: I Know Why the Caged Bird Screams
programme.desc: Football team mascot Carlton is kidnapped by students from a rival college just before a big game. Comedy, starring Will Smith.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: When You Hit Upon a Star
programme.desc: Will's love affair with singing superstar Michelle Michaels comes under threat when her handsome ex-boyfriend shows up. American comedy, guest starring Stacey Dash.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The outcome of a reality TV show puts Frankie in a bad mood for days, so Mike tries to snap her out of her depression. He also has his work cut out trying to toughen Sue up when she joins the school tennis team - the problem being she keeps complimenting her opponents during matches - while Axl and Cassidy wonder what the future holds for them following their big argument.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie has graduated from dental-assisting school, but the real challenge comes when she tries to find a job - especially when she attends an interview and realises she doesn't know how to answer even the most basic questions. Axl and his band secure their first paid gig but become distracted when Sue starts to interfere, while Mike reluctantly agrees to chaperone Brick's scout camping trip.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie discovers Sue has very little presence on Facebook, so she tries to increase her daughter's online popularity by creating a fake friend - or three. But how far can she go before she gets found out? Axl and Brick produce a James Bond spoof with a difference, while Mike is unhappy when he ends up listening to his father-in-law's long-winded stories.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie drops several hints as to what she wants for Mother's Day, but Mike refuses to play ball, arguing that it's the kids' responsibility and not his. Sue turns to Reverend TimTom for advice after failing her driving test again, and Cassidy drops a bombshell on Axl during their school prom.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Ross's Wedding - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Rachel and a heavily pregnant Phoebe stay at home while Chandler, Joey and Monica go to England for Ross's wedding to Emily. Once there, however, it seems all Joey and Chandler can do is bicker. Guest starring Richard Branson and Sarah Ferguson.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Ross's Wedding - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. As everyone makes their final preparations for Ross's wedding in London, Rachel tries to get a flight out to declare her love for him before he marries Emily. Guest starring Jennifer Saunders, Elliott Gould, Hugh Laurie and Tom Conti.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Rachel tries to fix up Monica with action-movie star Jean-Claude Van Damme, but ends up landing a date with him herself. Meanwhile, Chandler gets his comeuppance for a high-school prank he played on a former classmate. Guest starring Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies
programme.desc: Joey makes unfortunate comments in an interview with a fanzine, threatening his role as Dr Ramoray and casting a shadow over his acting career. Meanwhile, Chandler's new flatmate Eddie becomes increasingly annoying. Comedy, guest starring Tom Selleck, with Matt LeBlanc and Matthew Perry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Ross bumps into his ex-wife, and Chandler meets an old flame during a double date with Joey. Meanwhile, Rachel, Monica and Phoebe have a run-in with some firefighters.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Ross foolishly lets Rachel in on his most secret sexual fantasy, while Phoebe consoles a heartbroken Monica and Chandler gets involved with an old flame whom Joey cannot stand. David Schwimmer and Jennifer Aniston star.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
programme.desc: Rachel begins to feel smothered by Ross's constant attention. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for her song Smellycat, and Chandler's new flatmate Eddie causes problems.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Prom Video
programme.desc: Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a sign of their friendship, while Rachel insists she has no time for Ross - until Monica's old prom video helps her see him in a different light. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox and David Schwimmer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe learns the result of her pregnancy test and the friends' competitive spirit gets the better of them in a battle of the sexes arising from an apparently simple challenge. Comedy, starring Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross goes to a spray-tanning salon, but his failure to follow the instructions leaves him with a complexion he was not looking for. Joey and Rachel prepare to sleep together for the first time, but the night proves more awkward than romantic. Guest starring Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q take name-calling to new heights while posing as receptionists and try to get donations for bogus charities at a pizza shop.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q show who is boss while working at a fast-food restaurant and whisper sweet nothings to strangers, while this week's punishment involves a cow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler's home-made gift for Monica lands him in trouble. Joey hires a lookalike to help him participate in a medical study, and Ross demonstrates martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe. Comedy, starring Matthew Perry and Courteney Cox.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One in Vegas - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. The pals visit Las Vegas, where they find surprises galore awaiting them. Meanwhile, Ross misinterprets Rachel's intentions and embarks on a campaign of public humiliation against her - but discovers she is more than a match for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One in Vegas - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Rachel makes Ross feel guilty about the prank he played on her. Monica and Chandler have a spot of good luck and Joey tries out his latest get-rich-quick scheme. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston, David Schwimmer and Matthew Perry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe claims she kissed Ralph Lauren at Rachel's workplace, and room-mate Janine encourages Joey to get in touch with his feminine side, much to Chandler's annoyance. Ross bleaches his teeth in an effort to impress a date. Comedy, guest starring Elle Macpherson.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
programme.desc: A harassed Rachel tells Ross she thinks they should take a break from each other - so he responds by getting drunk and sleeping with a woman Joey and Chandler have been chasing. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross makes the mistake of agreeing to a game of rugby with Emily's tough English friends. Meanwhile, one of Chandler's old flames turns up out of the blue - and it seems it is not just a flying visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler conduct an embarrassing interview with a potential sperm donor after learning they cannot conceive a baby naturally. Rachel reveals she still has feelings for Joey, but his current girlfriend overhears her confession, and Phoebe bumps into her old boyfriend David. Comedy, guest starring John Stamos and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Your Face or Mine
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr and Katherine Ryan host the show that puts couples to the test, with former long jumper Greg Rutherford and his partner Susie Verrill competing to win money for charity.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Happy & Glorious
programme.desc: A chance to see a show from the popular stand-up star's 2015 tour of the UK and Ireland, recorded as-live at the O2 in London. Returning to a venue he has visited 27 times in the past, more than any other artist in the world, Michael showcases his particular brand of wit, taking aim once again at some of the absurdities of everyday life.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Linda learns about the world of essential oils from her new friend and Aunt Gayle becomes convinced that she needs someone to rescue her.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q do and say whatever the other guys tell them while posing as physical therapists, then pitch some ridiculous ideas for TV show hosts.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers: Inside Jokes
programme.desc: A look at how the crew keep the laugh-out-loud names secret from each of the jokers and which ideas failed to make it into the guys' dating profiles.

programme.title: Broad City
programme.desc: Last-ever episode of the comedy starring Ilana Glazer and Abbi Jacobson as two friends struggling to navigate the difficulties of everyday life in New York City. Last in the series.

programme.title: The Mick
programme.desc: Immersed in the family's feuding over their takeaway-strewn home, young Ben bares his teeth, prompting Alba to warn the discipline-averse Mickey that he is on the cusp of teen rebellion. When the kids call her bluff, she tries to put her years of immaturity to good use.(n)

programme.title: The Mick
programme.desc: Self-interested to the last, Chip conspires with Jimmy and Jerry to send Mickey's likeable new squeeze packing. Too frightened to explain to young Ben about life and death, Alba enables his terminally clumsy rabbit habit with a fresh supply of the hapless creatures.(n)

programme.title: The Daily Show
programme.desc: Trevor Noah takes a satirical sideswipe at the week's news, pop culture, sports and entertainment, featuring comedy sketches, on-the-spot reports and celebrity guests.(n)

programme.desc: With Mrs Garrison absent from school while searching for a way to be the man nature intended, Cartman is given control of the classroom. After doing an exemplary job as a substitute teacher, he finds himself in demand elsewhere to help inner-city youths.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The citizens of South Park wake up one morning to discover that the internet has gone. Randy hears that it may still exist in California, so decides to pack up his family and head out West to find it.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr Garrison takes the class on an educational field trip to a living museum, Pioneer Village, where all the workers remain dedicated to staying in character. Cartman makes Butters sneak away to go to the amusement centre next door.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman fears China is about to invade America, and prepares to defend his homeland - with only Butters to help him. Meanwhile, Stan, Kyle and Kenny are traumatised by an incident involving George Lucas and Steven Spielberg.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys try to earn themselves some extra pocket money by shovelling snow. programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Animal rights activists protest against the use of a cow as the school mascot, so the boys look to come up with an alternative. Kyle and Cartman mount their own unique campaigns and begin recruiting voters, but Stan refuses to take part, prompting the authorities to banish him from the town.(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Phoebe plans to return to her flat and tries desperately to persuade Rachel to join her, while Monica is infuriated by Chandler's inability to tip appropriately. Ross looks after Ben during the holiday season, and dresses as an armadillo to keep him entertained.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang celebrates Thanksgiving and Monica invites old high-school friend Will, the only student who was fatter than her - unaware of his animosity toward Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe try to avoid helping in the kitchen and Joey vows to eat an entire turkey. Guest starring Brad Pitt.(n)

programme.sub-title: Pilot (The One Where Monica Gets a Room-mate)
programme.desc: The first-ever episode of the comedy, in which Rachel arrives at the local cafe after jilting her fiance at the altar, while Monica consoles Ross, whose wife has left him for another woman. Courteney Cox and Jennifer Aniston star.(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with the Boob Job
programme.desc: Cash-strapped couple Chandler and Monica conceal from each other that they have asked Joey for money. Rachel goes overboard in a bid to make her home baby-friendly, while Phoebe asks Mike to move in with her, but has second thoughts once it becomes clear he does not share her enthusiasm for marriage.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe learns Joey's agent has died, but he is so upset about his friends moving away that she decides not to tell him. Rachel worries about relocating to France, while Monica and Chandler are horrified to discover Janice is planning to buy the house next door to them. Guest starring Jane Lynch (Glee).(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel meets a man called Russ who bears an uncanny resemblance to Ross, further confusing her already muddled emotions. Meanwhile, Joey discovers he will have to pass an intimate audition on the casting couch to get a part in a daytime soap.(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Joey somehow manages to lose Ross's wedding ring at the stag party, while Phoebe's pregnancy causes her to experience violent mood swings. Comedy, starring Matt LeBlanc and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.desc: Two lifelong best friends discover their weddings have been scheduled on the same day and at the same venue. Neither is prepared to back down, so a bitter rivalry ensues as years of friendship are cast aside in the struggle to sabotage each other's big day. Comedy, starring Kate Hudson, Anne Hathaway, Candice Bergen and Chris Pratt.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is mistaken for the owner of a Porsche and uses the mix-up to enhance his image. Rachel forces Ross to annul their marriage, and Phoebe tries her best to look after the triplets. American comedy, starring Matt LeBlanc and Jennifer Aniston.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachel's Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel is interviewed for her dream job, but makes the mistake of inadvertently kissing her prospective employer. Meanwhile, Monica competes with Phoebe in the relationship stakes.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel realises she wants to start dating Ross again and writes him an 18-page letter expressing her feelings - but he falls asleep while reading it. Phoebe and her estranged birth mother discover they have a lot in common, and Monica is stung by a jellyfish.(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Haste
programme.desc: Monica and Rachel plot to take back their old apartment from Chandler and Joey, and there are major changes afoot for lovebirds Ross and Emily. Comedy, starring Courteney Cox and Jennifer Aniston.(n)

programme.desc: Dara O Briain hosts a reboot of the quiz, with sixth-formers Nyah, Eddy and Manreet trying to complete a path across or down a board of lettered hexagons to win prizes.(n)

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd.(n)

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: A thirtysomething single woman fears she may never have children and decides to undergo artificial insemination. However, shortly after leaving the clinic, she meets the man of her dreams but must decide how to break the news she may shortly be pregnant. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen and Anthony Anderson.(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the rape of a cellist, and initially believe her conductor is to blame for the attack - especially given his penchant for erotic film-making. However, they soon discover an obsessive stalker is watching her from afar - and will stop at nothing to continue his monitoring. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Cabot takes a child abuse case, determined to find evidence that will convict the defendant. Her personal feelings tempt her to bend the rules, leading Stabler and Benson into an illegal search of the victim's home - a move that threatens all of their careers.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: Part one of two. The squad must work quickly to track down a serial killer before he strikes again. Meanwhile, things get dangerous during a game of chess. American police drama starring Mary McDonnell as Captain Sharon Raydor, the head of the Los Angeles Police Department's Major Crimes Division.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: Part two of two. The unit draws closer to apprehending a serial killer, and Rusty faces his biggest challenge yet when he takes the stand against Phillip Stroh. Jeri Ryan guest stars, with Mary McDonnell.

programme.title: Numb3rs
programme.desc: The agents are assigned to provide security to a reformed activist during a political rally, but when an assassination attempt is made on the campaigner's life, the team tries to hunt down the sniper before it is too late. Meanwhile, Charlie and Amita wait for the right moment to announce their engagement. Drama, starring Rob Morrow, Judd Hirsch, David Krumholtz and Navi Rawat.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Paramedics become suspicious about a baby's death, calling in Briscoe and Curtis, who discover the parents adopted the child from an illegal Russian ring. The case takes on another dimension altogether when it transpires that the crooks specialise in placing terminally ill infants with unsuspecting families. Starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Carmichael have the unenviable task of prosecuting three police officers with a racially motivated hate crime that threatens to cause uproar in the city. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Angie Harmon.

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Buffer faces a difficult time when he is kidnapped and later betrayed, while Mike Flynn is back at the helm. Ian Stenlake stars.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Everett and Shade investigate suspicious activity in suburbia with the aid of a resourceful 12-year-old.

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: Eric becomes a hostage himself after negotiations for the release of a couple being held in Canada go awry.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A narcotics detective plans a major drugs sting but makes the mistake of illegally using a teenager as bait - with fatal consequences. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis and Briscoe investigate after a child in day care is injected with a fatal disease. They uncover a medical scandal of frightening proportions, and the child's own father comes under suspicion. Award-winning police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A DNA assessment of a kidnapping crime scene reveals horrifying results for Natalia, who discovers her sister Anya is one of a number of missing women. Racing to track her down, the team finds a collection of photographs that may hold the key to breaking the case. Starring David Caruso, Eva La Rue and Adam Rodriguez.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A woman is killed shortly after participating in a charity event, and it emerges that she had tried to reveal the involvement of its hosts with terrorists. As the team delves deeper into her mysterious world, a plot is uncovered that could put the entire city in danger. Starring David Caruso.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The team unravels a family's dark past when a man and his two young children go missing. American police drama, starring Mary McDonnell.

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: A man who claimed to be innocent is murdered after being released from prison, leading detectives to reopen his case. American police drama, starring Mary McDonnell as Captain Sharon Raydor, head of the Los Angeles Police Department's Major Crimes Division.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. The safe house is attacked, leaving Vance in hospital and Eli missing, with his bodyguard Amit Hadar dead. The movements of all the Palestinians are accounted for at the time of the attack, making it unclear who was responsible, and Ziva suspects her Mossad replacement Liat is hiding something. Drama, starring Michael Nouri, Cote de Pablo, Rocky Carroll and Mark Harmon.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: Romantic comedy based on Heidi Murkoff's bestselling pregnancy book, starring Cameron Diaz and Jennifer Lopez. Five couples experience parenthood and soon discover that, even though it's the most natural thing in the world, nothing can prepare you for this life-changing experience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the rape of a cellist, and initially believe her conductor is to blame for the attack - especially given his penchant for erotic film-making. However, they soon discover an obsessive stalker is watching her from afar - and will stop at nothing to continue his monitoring. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Cabot takes a child abuse case, determined to find evidence that will convict the defendant. Her personal feelings tempt her to bend the rules, leading Stabler and Benson into an illegal search of the victim's home - a move that threatens all of their careers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The stepdaughter of a judge known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders is raped and murdered. Stabler and Benson's investigations reveal the rebellious girl had been involved with defendants in her stepfather's cases - and a revelation from her childhood leads the detectives to point the finger of suspicion at the victim's nearest and dearest. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate an assault on a restaurateur's wife, and find the attack is similar to a rape committed the previous week. They discover a locksmith visited both women's houses before the incident, but when they examine the stolen goods found in his toolbox, a new connection emerges - putting another suspect in the frame. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: The team unravels a family's dark past when a man and his two young children go missing. American police drama, starring Mary McDonnell.(n)

programme.title: Major Crimes
programme.desc: A man who claimed to be innocent is murdered after being released from prison, leading detectives to reopen his case. American police drama, starring Mary McDonnell as Captain Sharon Raydor, head of the Los Angeles Police Department's Major Crimes Division.(n)

programme.title: Numb3rs
programme.desc: A shoot-out at a bank leaves two FBI agents dead and one injured, so Charlie tries to put all the witnesses' testimonies together to create a reconstruction of what happened. Elsewhere, Larry starts cutting back on his classes, raising fears that he is heading for a career crisis. American crime drama, starring Rob Morrow and Peter MacNicol.(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: A cyclist is abducted in a park in broad daylight - and the only witness is a 90-year-old blind woman.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A witness jeopardises any chance of securing a conviction in the Mala Noche gang trial by helping to engineer the escape of the defendant - who then orders Horatio's death. Meanwhile, Delko discovers an ex-lover has begun to harass any woman who becomes close to him. Drama, starring David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The death of a loved one fills Horatio and Delko with renewed determination to smash the Mala Noche gang once and for all - but FBI agents seize the lab before they can achieve results. As events unfold, the unmasking of a mole in the CSI unit leaves everyone reeling. Drama, guest starring Eric Mabius alongside David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Calleigh's car is run off the road and into a canal while she is en route back to the lab - and although she is unhurt, vital evidence is compromised, jeopardising an investigation into a rogue biker gang. Realising the entire case is at risk, Horatio and the team try to find new leads to solve it. Forensic drama, starring Emily Procter and David Caruso.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The body of a celebrity is found at a party and the team discovers links with a mysterious gambling ring offering participants the chance to bet on the dates of famous people's deaths. Further investigation leads the officers to an offshore operation producing high-quality counterfeit banjoes. The forensic spin-off show's 100th episode, starring David Caruso and Emily Procter.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Two male models are found dead in suspicious circumstances - and as the team interrogates the owners of the agency that employed them, dark secrets are exposed behind all the glitz and glamour of the fashion world. Meanwhile, Natalia's abusive ex-husband makes an unwelcome reappearance - and applies for a job at the morgue. Starring David Caruso and Eva La Rue.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The body of a politician is found in an empty house, leading the team to investigate whether he was killed as a consequence of his corrupt policies that led to local residents being forced out of their homes. Crime drama, starring David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Wolfe disturbs a miniature coffin during inquiries at a murder scene, triggering a series of strange events that convinces him the entire investigation is cursed. The approach of Halloween reinforces his belief that mysterious forces are at work - and it is not long before everyone else begins to share the same view. With Jonathan Togo.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A daredevil driver is decapitated while performing a stunt at a street party, bringing the festivities to a premature end. Realising the incident was murder rather than an accident, the team focuses the investigation on a bystander whose expertise with remote-controlled cars makes him a likely suspect. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A DNA assessment of a kidnapping crime scene reveals horrifying results for Natalia, who discovers her sister Anya is one of a number of missing women. Racing to track her down, the team finds a collection of photographs that may hold the key to breaking the case. Starring David Caruso, Eva La Rue and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A woman is killed shortly after participating in a charity event, and it emerges that she had tried to reveal the involvement of its hosts with terrorists. As the team delves deeper into her mysterious world, a plot is uncovered that could put the entire city in danger. Starring David Caruso.(n)

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Shade and Angie are taken on a wild ride during a routine sting operation. Drama, starring Jason Priestley and Cindy Sampson.(n)

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Maz's sister needs Angie's help in recovering a creature that has gone missing from an aquarium. Drama, starring Jason Priestley and Cindy Sampson.(n)

programme.title: Friends with Kids
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Adam Scott and Jennifer Westfeldt. Jason and Julie are two single, long-time friends who want kids, but are put off by how parenthood has ruined the lives of their best buddies. They concoct a plan whereby they will share child-rearing responsibilities to allow them time to pursue their own love lives. But will the theory work in practice?(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the death of 17-year-old Anna McWilliams and discover she was using an internet site to arrange one-night stands with strangers. Warner reveals Anna was HIV positive - as was the man she was meant to meet on the night she died. Had he been deliberately passing on the virus by having unprotected sex?(n)

programme.title: Siren
programme.desc: Living in a tank proves difficult for the mermaids, and tensions are rising, forcing Ryn to make a difficult bargain. Fantasy, starring Alex Roe.

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Paranormal Files
programme.desc: Investigations into spooky figures spotted on the USS North Carolina and a UFO sighting near a construction site in Michigan.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Part two of two. Arthur and Merlin are exhausted as they make their way across the icy plains toward the fortress of Ismere, but with each tired step, the warlock's fear intensifies. What powerful secrets are Morgana and the druid Ruadan searching for among its twisted catacombs? And what dangerous game is Mordred playing? It seems not even Merlin can stop his king from walking into certain danger as the great battle for Albion begins.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Anya transforms back into a vengeance demon and returns to Sunnydale to punish Xander for leaving her at the altar. However, she finds she cannot exact magical vengeance for herself, only for others, so goes looking for someone to wish harm on her former fiance. Buffy discovers the Trio are spying on her, while Warren and Andrew suspect Jonathan's conscience is getting the better of him.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Part one of four. The Trio steal two mystical orbs that give Warren superhuman strength, allowing him to finally take on the slayer in a straight fight. Spike tries to force Buffy to admit she has feelings for him, and ends up trying to rape her. Willow and Tara get back together, but their happy reunion is overshadowed by a sudden and unexpected tragedy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Seven of Nine and Tuvok embark on an away mission to study a micro nebula, but are captured by an alien named Park. The former Borg finds herself forced to fight for her colleague's life in a gladiatorial arena, as part of a `Tsunkatse' competition. Sci-fi drama, guest starring Dwayne `The Rock' Johnson.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The Delta Flyer is captured by a Borg cube. The vessel turns out to be inhabited by a small group of abandoned drones, that nonetheless tries to assimilate the crew. Seven of Nine attempts to negotiate with the captors, hoping to persuade them to join her among Voyager's ranks. Jeri Ryan stars.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home.

programme.title: The Librarians
programme.desc: A Librarian from the past joins forces with the team to take down an ancient and powerful enemy let loose in the modern day.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A stranger gives Arthur the power to summon the dead, so he seizes the chance to speak to the person he misses most - his father, Uther Pendragon. But the young king's decision comes at a terrible price, for the spirit world is a dangerous place, leaving Merlin fighting against the odds to put right the mistake before Camelot is destroyed. Anthony Head guest stars, with Colin Morgan and Bradley James.

programme.title: War of the Worlds 2: the Next Wave
programme.desc: The Martian forces return to destroy Earth - and only a direct attack on their home planet can stop them. Sci-fi thriller sequel, directed by and starring C Thomas Howell, with Kim Little and Jonathan Levit.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Riley returns to Sunnydale pursuing a demon, accompanied by his new wife and fellow monster fighter. Buffy and Riley join forces to hunt a mysterious black market dealer selling dangerous demon eggs. Seeing how happy her ex-boyfriend is with his new life only reminds the slayer how badly things have gone for her since her resurrection - leading her to question her relationship with Spike.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Xander and Anya prepare to tie the knot, while struggling to keep the peace between his dysfunctional family and her demonic friends. Xander is approached by a mysterious old man claiming to be his future self, who warns him that marrying Anya will ruin his life - and to prove it, shows him a horrifying vision of what the future holds for them.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Torres and Kim respond to a bizarre automated distress call from Kohl settlers in artificial hibernation - only to find a strange world awaiting them. Sci-fi drama, starring Roxann Biggs-Dawson and Garrett Wang.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A version of the Enterprise that was destroyed more than 20 years ago and long-dead former crew member Tasha Yar appear through a temporal rift, leading Picard into a race against time to change history and save billions of lives. Sci-fi drama, guest starring Denise Crosby.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Data creates a daughter in the form of an android named Lal. However, when she starts showing signs of a more evolved consciousness, including the ability to feel emotions, Starfleet scientists decide to take her away for analysis. Hallie Todd and Whoopi Goldberg guest star.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A stranger gives Arthur the power to summon the dead, so he seizes the chance to speak to the person he misses most - his father, Uther Pendragon. But the young king's decision comes at a terrible price, for the spirit world is a dangerous place, leaving Merlin fighting against the odds to put right the mistake before Camelot is destroyed. Anthony Head guest stars, with Colin Morgan and Bradley James.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Thriller starring Colin Farrell. When sleazy New York publicist Stu Shepard answers a call in a public phone booth moments after speaking to his mistress, he's told that if he hangs up, he'll be shot. When a would-be caller is killed, Shepard finds himself in the sights of both the police and the hidden gunman.

programme.title: Highlander III: the Sorcerer
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christopher Lambert and Mario Van Peebles. Japan 1994: an archaeological dig on a mountain site releases trapped immortal Kane, buried in the 16th century after he beheaded Japanese sorcerer Nakano. Free at last, the revenge-seeking Kane resumes his search for rival immortal Connor MacLeod.

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Paranormal Files
programme.desc: An unidentified object flying over the harbour in Long Beach, California, that apparently deposits glowing seeds into the water, and a man who claims to have photographed ectoplasm.(n)

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Paranormal Files
programme.desc: Investigating a sighting of three mysterious lights hovering above water in Florida, and glowing orbs spotted in a Colorado woodland.(n)

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A stranger gives Arthur the power to summon the dead, so he seizes the chance to speak to the person he misses most - his father, Uther Pendragon. But the young king's decision comes at a terrible price, for the spirit world is a dangerous place, leaving Merlin fighting against the odds to put right the mistake before Camelot is destroyed. Anthony Head guest stars, with Colin Morgan and Bradley James.(n)

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Part two of four. Buffy is rushed to hospital with a gunshot wound, while Willow turns to black magic to seek revenge on Warren. As the would-be supervillain flees for his life, he realises he is not the feared force of evil he thought he was. Spike travels to Africa to make a pact with a powerful demon, while a recovered Buffy resolves that she cannot let her friend take a human life.(n)

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Part three of four. Having taken revenge on Warren for Tara's death, a vengeful Willow vows to go after the other two members of the trio, Jonathan and Andrew, who are currently behind bars - forcing Buffy to act as their protector. Meanwhile, in Africa, Spike continues battling to get his chip removed.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The characters in the holodeck-simulated Irish village of Fair Haven become aware of their surroundings, and they are convinced Paris and Kim are evil spirits. Before the pair can repair the malfunction, however, they are captured by the locals, forcing Janeway to enter negotiations for their release. Sci-fi adventure, starring Robert Duncan McNeill and Garrett Wang.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The crew is mystified by the reappearance of Ensign Lyndsay Ballard, who supposedly died on a mission years before. Sci-fi adventure, guest starring Kim Rhodes.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: Feature-length first episode of Joss Whedon's sci-fi drama. Veteran soldier Mal Reynolds becomes the captain of a spaceship used for smuggling after a civil war in which he was on the losing side. While ferrying his latest illicit cargo under the noses of the government, he takes on three passengers to provide respectable cover - but all of them seem to have secrets to hide. Starring Nathan Fillion.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: The crew accept a job from a sadistic gangster to steal cargo from a moving train. While the plan goes off without a hitch, they discover they have taken urgently needed medical supplies. Mal's conscience is pricked by the plight of the locals, but doing the right thing means incurring the wrath of their employer, who does not take kindly to failure.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: The crew encounter a derelict ship and go in search of salvage, only to find the craft had been attacked by the cannibalistic Reavers, leaving only one traumatised survivor. As they contend with booby traps left by the savage marauders, they are boarded by the Alliance and arrested for looting - while the refugee they rescued has been dangerously warped by the horrors he has witnessed.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: Mal gets a tip-off from Badger regarding a wealthy businessman looking to smuggle some cargo. He and Kaylee go to a high society party in the hope of sealing the deal, where Mal comes to blows with one of Inara's clients and ends up challenged to a duel. As Mal gets to grips with sword fighting, Badger takes over the ship to stop the crew interfering.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: When the crew deliver cargo to a frontier world, Simon and River are taken hostage by settlers. When Book is injured in a gunfight with bandits, Mal is forced to call off the search for his missing crewmembers and seek the aid of the Alliance to save the preacher's life. Simon learns his captors are not as malicious as they appeared and are in urgent need of his help. Featuring a young Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: The crew drive off bandits plaguing a frontier settlement, but while celebrating their victory, Mal unwittingly performs a traditional marriage ceremony with a local woman. She stows away aboard the ship and seems eager to please her husband, leaving Jayne consumed with envy. However, the supposedly innocent woman secretly has more sinister plans in mind for the ship and its unsuspecting crew. Christina Hendricks (Mad Men) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Firefly
programme.desc: Jayne is anxious to keep a low profile when the crew visits a planet where he is still wanted for a robbery he committed years ago. This proves difficult when it turns out the downtrodden populace consider him a Robin Hood-style folk hero. As Mal tries to find a way to turn Jayne's fame to his advantage, a vengeful old partner in crime comes looking for the accidental hero.(n)

programme.title: The Day after Tomorrow
programme.desc: Disaster movie from Independence Day director Roland Emmerich, starring Dennis Quaid and Jake Gyllenhaal. When climatologist Jack Hall tries to warn Washington that the planet is facing an imminent, catastrophic climate shift, government officials fail to take him seriously. But, when the Earth abruptly plunges into a new ice age, it soon becomes clear that the human race is facing extinction.(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: Science-fiction thriller starring Ed Harris and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio. While patrolling off the Cuban coast, an American nuclear submarine encounters a mysterious unseen force travelling at great speed. In the ensuing confusion, the vessel sinks 2,000 feet on to the ledge of an abyss. The crew's only hope of survival is a team of underwater drillers led by a tough foreman.(n)

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1987
programme.desc: Peter Powell and Simon Bates present the chart show, first broadcast on July 16, featuring Bananarama, Bruce Willis, Hue and Cry, Kenny G, Mel and Kim, Los Lobos, the Cure, Boogie Box High, Freddie McGregor, Pet Shop Boys and Madonna. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: TOTP2
programme.desc: Mark Radcliffe narrates a selection of Top of the Pops performances by George Michael and Andrew Ridgeley's duo, featuring Young Guns (Go For It!), Wham Rap! (Enjoy What You Do), Bad Boys, Club Tropicana, Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go, Freedom, Everything She Wants and Edge of Heaven. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Biggest Band Break-Ups and Make-Ups
programme.desc: Mark Radcliffe looks at the highs and lows of life in a band. He focuses on the creative tension that produces great material, as well as the pressures that comes with success and fame that can pull groups apart. The presenter looks at the most common reasons for splitting up, alongside the secrets of those that manage to stay together. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Country & Beyond with the Shires
programme.desc: Country duo Ben Earle and Crissie Rhodes reveal the songs that shaped their musical journey. They begin with Dolly Parton's iconic track Jolene. Following that comes Patsy Cline, as Crissie recalls singing along to Crazy with her grandmother. Ben then picks country-pop crossover Shania Twain, whose That Don't Impress Me Much certainly made its mark on him. He also plumps for Glen Campbell's legendary Wichita Lineman. The pair also cite critically acclaimed duo the Civil Wars and their spine-tingling live appearance on Later - with Jools Holland. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(c)

programme.title: British Sitcom: 60 Years of Laughing at Ourselves
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the history of the British TV sitcom, from Hancock's Half Hour in the 1950s to the present day, revealing the inspiration behind some of the most enduring characters and how comedy has reflected changing attitudes in society. Narrated by Rebecca Front, and featuring contributions from writers and actors including Steve Coogan, Richard Curtis, James Corden, Graham Linehan, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Something Special
programme.sub-title: Something Special: We're All Friends: Colours
programme.desc: Mr Tumble is painting and accidentally paints a rainbow. Meanwhile, Justin and his friend are putting on a colourful show at a theatre. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)

programme.desc: Raa Raa finds an infectious beat and all the animals join in except Ooo Ooo, who cannot get the rhythm right. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: It's bedtime, but Pablo keeps turning the light back on. Wren worries that when going sleep a person disappears. Mouse doesn't think this is true, but Pablo agrees with Wren. (CBeebies/tvguide.co.uk)

programme.desc: The day's leading stories. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1987
programme.desc: Janice Long and Simon Mayo introduces performances by Boy George, Atlantic Starr, Judy Boucher, Los Lobos, Errol Brown, Samantha Fox, Marillion, Beastie Boys, Luther Vandross, Shakin' Stevens, Madonna and Boogie Box High, in an edition first aired on July 23. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Fleetwood Mac: A Musical History
programme.desc: Fleetwood Mac are the great survivors of British and American rock music. For more than 50 years they've overcome break-ups and breakdowns to become one of the most successful bands of all time, selling over 100 million records worldwide, with their 1977 smash Rumours accounting for nearly half of those sales. Here, fan Edith Bowman provides a narrative overview, alongside fellow celebrity admirers who all pay tribute to the band. Contributors include KT Tunstall, Travis' frontman Fran Healy, Toyah Willcox, Sian Pattenden and Emma Dabiri. Last in the series. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(c)

programme.title: The Beatles: Made on Merseyside
programme.desc: Few dispute that the Beatles defined 1960s music and popular culture like no other band, but how John, Paul, George and Ringo made the journey from Merseyside teenagers to international pop stars is less known. Director Alan Byron's documentary recounts the rise of the band as American rock 'n' roll and rhythm and blues dragged post-war Liverpool into one of the most vibrant music cities ever with the Mersey Beat sound. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Sgt Pepper's Musical Revolution - with Howard Goodall
programme.desc: The composer explores why the Beatles' 50-year-old album is still revered as an innovative, revolutionary and influential release. With the help of out-takes, studio conversations between the band and never-heard-before outside of Abbey Road, Howard gets `under the bonnet' of the album, taking the music apart and reassembling it to reveal how it works. Producer George Martin and his team constructed the album sound by sound, layer by layer - a formula that became the norm for just about every rock act who followed. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Classic Albums: Paul Simon - Graceland
programme.desc: WARNING : show ends after 00:00!! The writing and recording of Paul Simon's Graceland, featuring tracks such as Diamonds on the Sole of Her Shoes. Since its 1986 release this album, with its blend of Western sounds and African rhythms, has changed the course of rock music. Contributors include composer Philip Glass. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1987
programme.desc: Janice Long and Simon Mayo introduces performances by Boy George, Atlantic Starr, Judy Boucher, Los Lobos, Errol Brown, Samantha Fox, Marillion, Beastie Boys, Luther Vandross, Shakin' Stevens, Madonna and Boogie Box High, in an edition first aired on July 23. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(n)

programme.title: Primal Scream: The Lost Memphis Tapes
programme.desc: The discovery of the band's missing tracks, laid down in Memphis' Ardent Studios in 1993, but subsequently mislaid. The band later re-recorded the songs with a new producer, and they were incorporated into their 1994 album Give Out But Don't Give Up, meaning the originals were left unreleased. With previously unreleased footage of behind-the-scenes studio sessions, this is the story of how the original mix tapes of the album were rediscovered in a basement by Andrew Innes, Primal Scream's rhythm guitarist. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(n)

programme.title: Fleetwood Mac: A Musical History
programme.desc: Fleetwood Mac are the great survivors of British and American rock music. For more than 50 years they've overcome break-ups and breakdowns to become one of the most successful bands of all time, selling over 100 million records worldwide, with their 1977 smash Rumours accounting for nearly half of those sales. Here, fan Edith Bowman provides a narrative overview, alongside fellow celebrity admirers who all pay tribute to the band. Contributors include KT Tunstall, Travis' frontman Fran Healy, Toyah Willcox, Sian Pattenden and Emma Dabiri. Last in the series. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(n)

programme.title: Jacqueline du Pre: A Gift Beyond Words
programme.desc: Tribute to the cellist, originally shown in October 2017, marking the 30th anniversary of her death. Du Pre was one of Britain's most acclaimed performing musicians, but her career was cut short by a diagnosis of multiple sclerosis when she was 28, leading to her death just 14 years later. The programme features footage from five films made during her lifetime. (BBC Four/radiotimes.com)(n)

programme.desc: Jack grows suspicious of Vera `working late'. Derek starts looking for a job, Steve is scared that he's going to Borstal, while Sally finds it hard looking after all the children.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A gang of youths push Peggy down a hole while she's poaching. Lord Ashfordly alerts Miller, who gives chase - but lands himself in trouble when he knocks down an elderly pedestrian. However, the incident gives Peggy a new money-making idea - she'll sue for the `injury' she sustained in the fall. Meanwhile, Gina is attracted to her handsome college tutor. Tim Brooke-Taylor and Murray Head guest star.

programme.desc: Cabot Cove's new physical fitness instructor is accused of murdering a con artist interested in property, presenting Jessica with a fresh mystery to solve. Angela Lansbury stars.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Ever since a beautiful American woman arrived in the peaceful village of Wychwood-under-Ashe, people have begun to die in a series of apparent accidents. Nobody suspects a killer is at work but, as the body count rises, Miss Marple digs a little deeper with the help of a former policeman - and they gradually unearth a secret that will rock the village to its core. Murder mystery, starring Julia McKenzie, Benedict Cumberbatch, David Haig, Sylvia Syms, Margo Stilley and Hugo Speer.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A gang of elderly villains spot a chance for one last, glorious crime spree when the villagers leave Aidensfield en masse to support Rob in a charity football match. Peg finally gives David a bit of support when it turns out his jury duty is more trouble than he imagined. Rural police drama, starring Sophie Ward, Jonathan Kerrigan, Gwen Taylor and David Lonsdale.

programme.title: Coronation Street
