programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Tree surgeon Toby and his wife Marika are eager to buy their dream home in Cornwall, but while Toby wants to be within walking distance of a Cornish beach, Marika wants land for a vegetable patch. Country girl Sara Damergi and coastal fan Kerr Drummond have their work cut out competing to find everything the pair want within a budget of £180,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Having just retired, Carlene Barnard wants to buy a holiday home on the Costa Blanca so that all of her family - two kids, six grandchildren and one great grandchild - can spend quality time together in the Spanish sunshine. Scarlette Douglas shows her and daughter Kerrie five properties for £90,000 in and around the seaside town of Torrevieja.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Tim and Irene Foster are looking for a place to escape the cold British winters. Irene is originally from Cape Town in South Africa and has long dreamed of owning a property there so that she can see her family more often. With a budget of £240,000, Laura Hamilton shows them five properties on the Cape Peninsula.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with house-hunters from previous episodes for whom space was a decisive issue. In East Lothian, he visits Ian, who wanted a workshop for his collection of vehicles and spare parts, while in Wolverhampton, he drops in on Darren and Me'sha, who wanted room for a recording studio.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two sets of house-hunters looking for homes in Birmingham. Kirstie helps sewing blogger Elle and her fiance Ed, who have seen 52 properties and still cannot find the perfect pad. Phil helps Ben and Laura, who are relocating from Bristol. Their main concern is that they do not get stuck in suburbia.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Aspiring rapper Warren Temple kicks off a week of dinner parties in Peterborough, where he hopes his Spanish-influenced menu will impress his guests - ethical trader Donna Trafford, glamour model Susie Hutson, straight-talking professional Vicki Culverhouse and veterinary nurse Robin Hills - and make him an early contender for the £1,000 prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ethical trader Donna Trafford hosts the second night in Peterborough, and plans to wow her guests with a colourful evening of tasty food and relaxed fun in a bid to win the £1,000 prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the third night in Peterborough, glamour model and columnist Susie Hutson is out to prove she's not the dizzy blonde some of the guests assume she is - and it doesn't take long for ethical trader Donna Trafford and would-be rapper Warren Temple to make an unexpected discovery that proves there's more to Susie than meets the eye.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Straight-talking businesswomen Vicki Culverhouse hosts the fourth night of the competition in Peterborough. She surprises the group when she unleashes some poetry at the dinner table, after having been very direct with the other diners throughout the week.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Veterinary nurse Robin Hills is the final host of the competition in Peterborough. He prepares an animal-themed evening, accompanied by well-presented cuisine, which he hopes will be a big hit with his guests.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Orang-utan sisters Emma and Subis are due to give birth at the same time, but after being in labour for more than 24 hours with no progress, Subis is rushed to the vet for a possible C-section. Meerkats Beagle and Huskie have moved to the zoo as the new breeding pair, but their new housemates, the aardvarks, are making them anxious. In an effort to make them more comfortable in their new home, the team decide to redesign the paddock to give the meerkats their own space.

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A couple who have spent their lives saving stray animals bring in a three-legged cat called Jersey, who has recently become lame in her single back leg. The vet must decide whether the first-ever hip replacement on a three-legged cat is viable. Plus, a Great Dane is given a custom-designed spinal implant, and a Dogue de Bordeaux gets help with elbow dysplasia.

programme.title: 999: On the Frontline
programme.desc: Paramedics are called to a custody suite in Birmingham to deal with a prisoner who is aggressive and abusive but may have overdosed on heroin. Paramedic Rob Moore and student paramedic Ally Shipway tread a fine line between looking after him and themselves. At the same time, across the city, paramedics Jo Hardwick and Peter Bowles are called to a man who is found unconscious at the roadside.

programme.title: Grand Designs: Living in
programme.sub-title: Grand Designs: Living in the City
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud presents one of four special programmes inspired by 15 years of Grand Designs. He begins with a look at the challenges of self-building in the city, where space is at a premium and architects have to be at their most ingenious. Kevin uses footage from the best urban builds from the show over the years, meets pioneers at the forefront of the latest architectural thinking and looks at clever innovations that continue to transform people's lives to reveal which designs work best and why.

programme.title: Deutschland 86
programme.desc: Badly injured, Martin wakes up in the Libyan desert, where he meets some new faces, uncovers an imminent terrorist plot and ultimately manages to escape. Thomas Posimski starts broadcasting secret interviews with East German dissidents over West German protest radio. After abandoning Martin, Lenora must confront the reality of her life and choices - and tell Walter Schweppenstette what has happened. For the first time in their lives, Tina and her husband Christoph contemplate leaving East Germany for good. In German.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A young man who has had a severe reaction to a recreational drug is wheeled into resus by paramedics, and senior sister Jen and the medical team face a challenge to calm their patient down so they can treat him. A 65-year-old woman is brought in by her best friends after hitting her head when she fell off a chair while playing bingo, and a 31-year-old man with multiple sclerosis is rushed in after developing a fever at home.

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Schizophrenic Graham, 75, is brought to King's College Hospital after being stabbed in the neck by a stranger on his doorstep, and needs a CT scan to reveal the extent of his wound. Former nursery nurse Pat, 89, also arrives on the ward, having been found at the bottom of the stairs at home with no recollection of how she got there, while palliative care nurse Tracey treats 72-year-old retired postman Michael, who was recently diagnosed with lung cancer.

programme.title: 999: On the Frontline
programme.desc: Paramedics are called to a custody suite in Birmingham to deal with a prisoner who is aggressive and abusive but may have overdosed on heroin. Paramedic Rob Moore and student paramedic Ally Shipway tread a fine line between looking after him and themselves. At the same time, across the city, paramedics Jo Hardwick and Peter Bowles are called to a man who is found unconscious at the roadside.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Yanni's in Seattle, where he clashes with defiant owner Peter Avgoustiou, a chef so set in his ways that he hasn't allowed any changes to his menu since the Greek restaurant opened in 1984. Peter's family is concerned the business is becoming trapped in the past, and standards are slipping, but he seems determined to stick to his guns.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A young man who has had a severe reaction to a recreational drug is wheeled into resus by paramedics, and senior sister Jen and the medical team face a challenge to calm their patient down so they can treat him. A 65-year-old woman is brought in by her best friends after hitting her head when she fell off a chair while playing bingo, and a 31-year-old man with multiple sclerosis is rushed in after developing a fever at home.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson are joined by guests Fern Brady, Phil Spencer, Carol Vorderman and Henning Wehn to discuss and dissect the events that set the British public's chins wagging. Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food Bites
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver is joined by his friend, the Italian chef Gennaro Contaldo, to make bolognese ravioli.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Nurses Philip Vaux and Alec Billen from Somerset have been dreaming about owning a place in Spain for 10 years. Having inherited some money when Alec's father died, they have decided to buy a holiday home in the beautiful province of Almeria in south-east Spain, so call on Laura Hamilton for advice.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Amanda and Adam Cropper have been visiting Phuket in Thailand on holiday for some time and love it so much they decided to get married on the island. Now they're looking for their very own property there, initially to use as a holiday home before they move out full-time in the next few years. Jonnie Irwin guides them through the local market and shows them five properties for their £160,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Former How Clean is Your House? presenter Kim Woodburn and her husband Pete decide they would like to take ownership of a holiday home on the Costa del Sol, so Jonnie Irwin takes them to view five penthouses that meet their £320,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit two sets of house-hunters who had very specific search criteria. Sisters Gemma and Lucy wanted two of everything in their potential new home in Reading, Berkshire, including parking spaces, bathrooms and equal-sized bedrooms, and professional historical architects Colin and Robin had an exacting list of requirements for Phil in Sussex.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer guide more prospective property buyers through the complex world of viewings and agents. David and Claire Wainwright have £460,000 to find a family home in Bournemouth, Dorset, to help them recreate the relaxed, beachside lifestyle they enjoyed in Australia. New parents Matt and Jodie Annen are also looking for a family home, but can't agree on where it should be. With £350,000 to spend, she thinks Bournemouth would offer them all they need, while he has his heart set on the pricier postcodes of neighbouring Poole.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer helps John and Stella move from Hampshire to Scotland, searching for a home with a view in the rural Lowlands close to Loch Lomond. Kirstie Allsopp is with Mikey and Anna, who are looking for a flat in the West End of Glasgow. However, so far they have fallen foul of the competitive market in a search that has become something of a family affair.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: DJ Mozz from Bury hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in and around Manchester, treating his guests to garlic stilton mushrooms and poached pears.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Manchester, voiceover artist and film extra Matt cooks up a Jewish Friday night supper, including his mum's traditional chicken soup.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Budding author and mum-of-five Cleona is next to host in Manchester, hoping a menu based on her Jamaican roots will get her guests onside.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Australian radio content director James hosts the fourth party in Manchester, hoping his menu containing Chinese cuisine and his mum's cake recipe can land him the top spot.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Events boss Sharon hosts the final night in Manchester. With her hearty decadent menu on offer, she has to win over Cleona after a bust up on from Cleona's turn as host. Sharon's skills and decorum are put to the test, though Mozz, Matt and James are on hand for moral support.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Langsmeade House in Thame, Oxfordshire, where Dutch-born owner Marianne Abben and her housekeeper Fran Birch hope to demonstrate that their B&B offers the best value for money. The quirky pair's hosting style proves a hit with some of their guests, before others reveal their competitive side during a Charleston dance lesson.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners visit the Stratford House Guesthouse in Stratford-upon-Avon on their second outing, where couple Natasha and Dai Pollock hope to impress their peers. But things do not run smoothly, as the guests are left unimpressed with the decor and discover nasty surprises in some of the drawers.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third B&B of the week is pet-friendly Edmund House in Deal, Kent, where owner Michael Prime is joined by his mum Lorna. On arrival, Marianne Abben and Fran Birch love the seaside-inspired room, but entrepreneur Mark Genders is far from thrilled by the `no frills' experience. Over dinner, tensions run high after self-confessed trouble-maker Marianne asks Mark to reveal which of the group he would and would not employ, and Lorna gets short shrift when she puts forward her application.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Entrepreneur Mark Genders welcomes the contestants to the Five Bells Pub in Berkshire and hopes they will approve of his small but perfectly formed rooms. He organises an ale-tasting activity, although it fails to please all of his guests. Michael and Lorna admit they have seen a new side of Mark - however, will it affect their feedback?(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners settle some scores and discover how much they have been paid, before the winner is revealed. Marianne and Fran from Langsmeade House begin by explaining that their worn rug is in fact a 200-year-old antique, Natasha and Dal from Stratford House confront Michael and Lorna about their strong language and cleaning techniques, while Mark Genders compares his experience at Edmund House to flying with a low budget airline.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Home Bird Live
programme.desc: Stand-up show recorded in 2014 at Newcastle's Tyne Theatre & Opera House, in which the comedienne shares humorous insights into her life, including the need to put down some roots now she has cats. Plus, she offers advice on what to take away on a dirty weekend, how to teach a pensioner to swear and the correct number of meals to consume in a day.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Thoroughly Modern Millican Live
programme.desc: Stand-up performance, recorded at London's Hammersmith Apollo during the comedienne's 2012 UK tour. Anecdotes include life's humdrum curiosities, the wonders of making a home-made treadmill, the reasons for carrying spare pants and the practicalities of an orgy.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Chatterbox Live
programme.desc: Stand-up show recorded at London's Bloomsbury Theatre in 2011, in which the comedienne shares humorous insights into her life, including the perils of living alone, and offers advice on such topics as non-fattening stress relief, the alternative to marriage and the acceptable face of adultery.(n)

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien hope a clay pigeon trap, a searchlight and a Peugeot 205 will help make a profit for their owners.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Four contestants host dinner parties in Birmingham, with fisherwoman Natalie kicking off the competition followed by Dot, Damon and Theo.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores. Grosmont House B&B is first, and hosts Selma Khan and Roxy Khan-Williams want to put mattress matters to rest. Next, Paulo and Suzi Lacey from Monkspool B&B are reluctant to engage with their fiercest critics.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to host in Manchester is 43-year-old DJ Oscar, who hopes to impress his guests with a menu of mouth-watering Mediterranean treats. However, with a three-part tapas starter, he finds he may have bitten off more than he can chew.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sun-worshippers Carol and Junior Smith from Middlesex have cashed in their savings and cannot wait to buy a holiday home where they can spend more quality time as a family. With a budget of £70,000, Jonnie Irwin shows them five properties near the popular Mar Menor in the south-east of Spain. Will they go for a bungalow with a rooftop terrace or a spacious townhouse that has them lost for words?(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows a number of properties to Mena and Bal Patel, who want to buy a holiday home in Orihuela on the Costa Blanca in Spain.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie tries to gain the upper hand in her relationship with new daughter-in-law Amy, but Debra is determined the latest Barone wife will not endure the kind of interference she has had to put up with.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Michael stays home from school for two days in a row, causing Ray to wonder whether he is trying to avoid something. Determined to discover the truth, he deprives the youngster of television, comics and video games to sweat the answer out of him through sheer boredom.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne falls out with Sherry and flees the apartment after the two have a blazing row. With nowhere else to go, she asks if she can spend the night at Niles's flat, leaving him quaking with excitement. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles receives divorce papers from Maris - and to show he is not as spineless as people think, he signs them immediately. Later, though, he begins to regret his impulsiveness. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: After Niles asks him whether he should stay with Maris, Frasier wanders the streets in film-noir fashion to find an answer for his long-suffering brother. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A message mistakenly left on an answering machine leads to a possible romance for Frasier, who rushes off to the airport to meet the caller. Guest starring Linda Hamilton, with Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Queens, New York, where he meets a family torn apart by the stress of running failing Greek restaurant Kati Allo. Husband-and-wife owners Manny and Christine are on the brink of divorce, while their daughter Evelyn is caught in the middle and at her wits' end.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to Connecticut's oldest inn, the Curtis House in Woodbury, which has been owned by the Hardisty family for generations. However, the business has started to fall apart and their legacy is on the brink of being lost. Siblings Chris and TJ, who are in charge, no longer speak to each other and the staff and guests feel stuck in the middle.(n)

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Stephanie finishes her mother Isobel's apartment. Painted and decorated, it now has her fathers framed pictures on the walls, a stunning 200-year-old mahogany canopy, plus furniture. Elsewhere, Jayne and Steve finish the Oriental Room and are ready to take in guests. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Great Canal Journeys
programme.desc: Timothy West and Prunella Scales explore the Naviglio Grande Canal in Italy, which runs from Lake Maggiore to Milan and is Europe's oldest working canal, providing passage for marble-carrying barges for over 500 years. Along the way, they stop at the Swiss lakeside town of Locarno, the gardens of Isola Bella, and Milan's most famous cathedral, as well as learning a traditional Italian barging song.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: The latest incident in a knife crime epidemic sees officers from Bedfordshire Police respond to a 999 call reporting a stabbing in broad daylight. Cameras follow detectives as they race to the scene, where a young man lies bleeding on the ground, and every twist and turn of the investigation is followed in scenes that have become all too familiar across the country. This is real-life drama where the focus on the human story behind the statistics is more compelling than the seemingly endless daily headlines.(n)

programme.title: Derry Girls
programme.desc: The Quinns cause uproar at a family wedding, and when the girls - and James - fail to behave themselves at the reception, the consequences are very serious indeed, especially for poor cousin Eammon (played by guest star Ardal O'Hanlon). Comedy from writer Lisa McGee, set against the Troubles in early-1990s Northern Ireland, starring Saoirse-Monica Jackson, Nicola Coughlan, Jamie-Lee O'Donnell, Louisa Harland and Dylan Llewellyn.(n)

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Presenters Sandi Toksvig and Noel Fielding, along with judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, welcome four more celebrities into the tent to expose their soft centres. Broadcaster Jeremy Paxman, comedian Joe Wilkinson, actress Sally Lindsay and reality star Georgia Toffolo make characterful biscuits for their Signature challenge, followed by a Technical that leaves them nowhere to hide, and finally they make a cake in the shape of their favourite hobby. They're baking to inspire viewers to do the same and raise money for Stand Up to Cancer.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Shows including The Dirt, Catchpoint, Race Across the World, This Morning, and Married at First Sight are subjected to the householders' instant reactions. Narrated by Craig Cash.(n)

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Redneck has an opportunity to demonstrate his knowledge by designing an aquarium based on a motor home. Plus, the guys take on an indoor project involving alligators and sharks.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Wayde King and Brett Raymer are asked to create a multi-activity tank for a fitness mogul, and build a hexagonal shaped tank for a casino.

programme.title: Tanked

programme.desc: The Kilchers pay tribute to a fallen old friend by driving cattle back home, and Atz Lee prepares the Hunters Cabin in anticipation of moving further away from the homestead.(c)

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The boys invite some local girls back to their property for a unique style of bush dating and Billy barters for windows for their new home.(c)

programme.desc: Billy is forced to seek medical help when he falls seriously ill, while the kids must fend for themselves and build a large raft for use when moving lumber.(c)

programme.title: Bear Grylls: Born Survivor
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes special focusing on the camera crew that films the adventurer as he jumps from planes, crosses shark-infested waters and climbs sheer cliffs.(c)

programme.desc: The adventurer heads to Utah, where he must be wary of cougars, black bears and rattlesnakes, and has the difficult challenge of controlling his descent as he navigates canyons.

Drama, starring Michael Nouri, Cote de Pablo, Rocky Carroll and Mark Harmon.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: A sinister psychiatrist offers to help Dr Sloan exact revenge on a downsizing expert who threatens the medic's job - in return for a deadly favour. Detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.

programme.desc: The crime-busting clergyman befriends a woman whose mysterious disappearance alerts them to a bizarre kidnapping plot. Sister Steve goes undercover as a maid for the missing woman's family to get to the bottom of the mystery. Starring Tom Bosley and Tracy Nelson.

programme.desc: The agents have to save a stricken US Special Forces unit - but to do so, they must survive the freezing temperatures of Antarctica.

programme.desc: Callen, Hanna and the team search for a group of terrorists suspected of murdering an ex-army sergeant. Meanwhile, Deeks and Kensi continue to bond. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.

programme.title: Father Dowling Mysteries
programme.desc: Sister Steve protects a boy from a killer masquerading as a department-store Santa, while Father Dowling tries to convince police the threat is serious. Tom Bosley and Tracy Nelson star.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Dr Sloan is sceptical of a psychic's claims that she has witnessed a murder, but Jesse staunchly maintains the woman's story is true. Guest starring George Hamilton.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Three women tempt fate by publishing their kiss-and-tell memoirs and almost pay with their lives. Dick Van Dyke stars in an instalment featuring Jeri Ryan, and US radio DJ Rick Dees as himself.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: An escaped convict goes on a killing spree, seeking revenge against those who put him away. Walker and Trivette race to stop him before he murders the trial judge who sentenced him.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hetty dispatches the team to recover a book containing top-secret information, which has been stolen from the personal effects of a murdered antiques dealer. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.

programme.title: Scorpion
programme.desc: Sylvester comes face to face with his father Ken, a retired army colonel. He asks Scorpion for help when he suspects an African dictator of possessing a deadly weapon which was previously thought to be a myth.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team continue their investigation into the murder of a porn star found strangled in a park. However, a forensic blunder puts the case in jeopardy - and Delko gets the blame.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: A medical student is murdered - and Dr Sloan suspects it is only a matter of time before the killer strikes again. Dick Van Dyke stars.(n)

programme.desc: The medic investigates the suspicious deaths of several homeless people, who are seemingly being killed for their organs at a clinic funded by a friend. Dick Van Dyke stars.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: An unpopular woman is accused of killing her wealthy husband - but luckily for her, she has a twin sister to provide her with a seemingly airtight alibi. Robert Vaughn guest stars.(n)

programme.desc: Part two of two. Gibbs continues to blame himself for Kate's death, and enlists Jenny's help to track down Ari - but they are nearly killed in a shoot-out. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs tries to extract information from a convict on death row about where he hid the bodies of his victims. However, the killer proves reluctant to confess, forcing the team to solve the case by unconventional means. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.desc: A marine who appears to have been leading a double life is shot dead. As the investigation continues, however, the team uncovers a case of identity theft - together with a tangled motive involving a mysterious package and a wronged wife. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.desc: The murder of a marine's wife is shown live on the internet and inquiries point to two housewives who were running their own pornographic website, but have since vanished. programme.desc: Examining the case of Rhonda Casto, who fell to her death whilst on a scenic hike with her boyfriend, Stephen Nichols.(n)

programme.desc: A man suspected in his girlfriend's murder swears his innocence, and hopes that his Fitbit device can prove he is innocent.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

A disused abbey that is believed to be cursed is about to be turned into a pub, a decision that has angered many superstitious locals - not to mention the real ale society. Elaine Paige guest stars, while Annette Badland joins the cast as new pathologist Fleur Perkins.(n)

programme.desc: Suspense thriller starring Rachel McAdams and Cillian Murphy. Travelling back home to Miami on a turbulent night flight, Lisa Reisert is delighted to find herself sitting next to Jackson Rippner, the apparently charming man she'd flirted with at the airport. But pleasure turns to horror when he informs her that he's an operative in a complex political assassination plot - and Lisa is the key to its success. programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: When a military academy is threatened with demolition, the fiercely loyal cadets break out the contents of the armoury and fight to defend the institution from the invading developers - ultimately leading to a confrontation with the real army. Drama, starring George C Scott, Timothy Hutton, Sean Penn and Tom Cruise.(n)

programme.title: Modern Life Is Rubbish
programme.desc: A decade after getting together, music lovers Liam and Natalie decide to split, but their record collection keeps pulling them back together. Romantic comedy, starring Josh Whitehouse, Freya Mavor and Ian Hart.(n)

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: In 1935, 13-year-old Briony Tallis discovers the burgeoning relationship between her older sister Cecilia and Robbie Turner, a servant's son whom she has a crush on herself. The teenager becomes increasingly jealous of the pair and spitefully accuses him of a crime he did not commit, unaware her actions will have tragic repercussions. Joe Wright's romantic period drama, based on Ian McEwan's novel, starring Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan and Romola Garai.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Baker Dill lives a peaceful life as a fishing boat captain, leading tours off a tranquil cove. His peace is shattered when estranged ex-wife Karen reappears, begging for him to help save her and their son from her violent husband. Thriller, written and directed by Peaky Blinders creator Steven Knight, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Diane Lane.(n)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and an Oscar-winning Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Baker Dill lives a peaceful life as a fishing boat captain, leading tours off a tranquil cove. His peace is shattered when estranged ex-wife Karen reappears, begging for him to help save her and their son from her violent husband. Thriller, written and directed by Peaky Blinders creator Steven Knight, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Diane Lane.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Women's tennis champion Billie Jean King takes up the challenge of former men's champ Bobby Riggs to a winner-takes-all match. Comedy drama, starring Emma Stone, Steve Carell and Andrea Riseborough.(n)

programme.title: American Pie: the Wedding
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan. After pursuing each other through two movies, Jim and Michelle finally decide to tie the knot, but their friends' plans for a bachelor party almost derail the forthcoming nuptials.

programme.title: EuroTrip
programme.desc: Comedy starring Scott Mechlowicz, Michelle Trachtenberg and Jacob Pitts. An American high-school student embarks on a trip across Europe with his friends to meet the buxom German blonde with whom he's been corresponding via the internet.

programme.title: Joyride
programme.desc: Three accidental outlaws travel the length of the New Zealand in a yellow mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy in hot pursuit. Comedy, starring Dean O'Gorman, James Rolleston and Ashleigh Cummings.

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: A small-town beat combo become a national overnight sensation with their debut record - but their sudden success looks to be a one-off, leaving them struggling to find a way of repeating the formula. Comedy drama set in the 1960s, written and directed by Tom Hanks, who also appears as the band's manager. With Tom Everett Scott, Liv Tyler and Johnathon Schaech.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Comedy starring Marlon Wayans and Shawn Wayans. Two black brothers are threatened with expulsion from the FBI following a failed drugs bust. In an attempt to save their jobs, they disguise themselves as rich, white socialite sisters to uncover and foil a kidnapping plot.

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow and Jack Black. A determination to follow his father's advice and date only beautiful women has not proved much of a success for Hal Larson. But a chance encounter with self-help guru Tony Robbins leaves Hal blessed with the ability to see only inner beauty, and it's not long before he is smitten with the larger-than-life Rosemary.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson. Mr Bean puts the entente cordiale under considerable strain when he wins a camcorder and a trip to France in a raffle. After a typically accident-prone encounter with a Russian film director, the hapless hero ends up at the Cannes film festival.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Julie, Kayla and Sam are high school seniors who make a pact to lose their virginity on prom night. Lisa, Mitchell and Hunter are the overprotective parents who try to stop the girls from sealing the deal, no matter what the cost. Comedy, starring Leslie Mann, John Cena and Ike Barinholtz.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney and Cameron Diaz. When food critic Julianne Potter learns that her best friend and ex-lover, sportswriter Michael O'Neal, is getting married, she vows to sabotage the wedding. Thwarted in her initial efforts, she resorts to more underhand methods when she introduces her gay friend George (Rupert Everett) as her fiancé!

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson. Mr Bean puts the entente cordiale under considerable strain when he wins a camcorder and a trip to France in a raffle. After a typically accident-prone encounter with a Russian film director, the hapless hero ends up at the Cannes film festival.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Julie, Kayla and Sam are high school seniors who make a pact to lose their virginity on prom night. Lisa, Mitchell and Hunter are the overprotective parents who try to stop the girls from sealing the deal, no matter what the cost. Comedy, starring Leslie Mann, John Cena and Ike Barinholtz.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Comedy that reunites the gang from the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan and Seann William Scott. Old friends Jim, Oz and Stifler assemble for their high school reunion, but while they might now be thirty-somethings with all the trappings of a suburban lifestyle, trouble, and rampant hormones, are still not far away.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Comedy starring Tina Fey and Steve Carell. Married couple Phil and Claire Foster plan a visit to a swanky Manhattan restaurant, but on arrival discover it is fully booked. In a desperate effort to get a table they claim to be the Tripplehorns, a couple who haven't taken up their reservation. But the no-show diners have some shady acquaintances and Phil and Claire's little deception leads to a night of mayhem.(n)

programme.title: The Layover
programme.desc: Two friends on a trip compete for the affections of a handsome man when their flight is redirected due to a hurricane. Comedy, starring Alexandra Daddario, Matt Barr and Kate Upton.(n)

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Neil Simon's comedy of opposites, starring Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau. When Felix Ungar's marriage breaks up, his carefree poker pal Oscar Madison invites him to share in the squalor of his apartment. However, once the neurotic, domesticated Felix gives the place the 'Good Housekeeping Seal of Approval', Oscar is determined that one of them must go and it won't be him.(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler and Téa Leoni. Single parent Flor and her beloved young daughter Cristina flee Mexico for a new life in LA. Settled in a Latino community, Flor has no reason to venture out or learn English, until the day she becomes housekeeper to the affluent Clasky family. A fish out of water, she finds their American culture a total shock, particularly when parent Deborah Clasky decides to compete for Cristina's affections.(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler, Patricia Arquette and Harvey Keitel. When Satan's rebellious sons Adrian and Cassius attempt to oust their father from power by fleeing to Earth, it falls upon the Antichrist's youngest son Nicky to protect the paternal domain by returning his brothers to Hell.(n)

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Salma Hayek. Thirty years after winning a junior basketball championship a group of friends reunite for their old coach's funeral, bringing with them all the baggage and emotional angst of adulthood.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore. Wedding singer Robbie Hart is usually the master of the big occasion, but when his own bride leaves him at the altar, his life - and performances - go to pieces. Then he meets Julia, who seems to be his perfect partner, but she's already engaged and wants Robbie to organise her wedding.(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and John Turturro. Having grown tired of combat, Israeli super-agent Zohan Dvir fakes his own death and escapes to New York, determined to fulfil his ambition of becoming a top hairdresser. He talks his way into a job at a salon owned by an attractive Palestinian woman, and soon Zohan is bringing in the money by offering his female clientele services beyond perms and blue rinses.(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler and Téa Leoni. Single parent Flor and her beloved young daughter Cristina flee Mexico for a new life in LA. Settled in a Latino community, Flor has no reason to venture out or learn English, until the day she becomes housekeeper to the affluent Clasky family. A fish out of water, she finds their American culture a total shock, particularly when parent Deborah Clasky decides to compete for Cristina's affections.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Salma Hayek. Thirty years after winning a junior basketball championship a group of friends reunite for their old coach's funeral, bringing with them all the baggage and emotional angst of adulthood.(n)

Wedding singer Robbie Hart is usually the master of the big occasion, but when his own bride leaves him at the altar, his life - and performances - go to pieces. Then he meets Julia, who seems to be his perfect partner, but she's already engaged and wants Robbie to organise her wedding.(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and John Turturro. Having grown tired of combat, Israeli super-agent Zohan Dvir fakes his own death and escapes to New York, determined to fulfil his ambition of becoming a top hairdresser. He talks his way into a job at a salon owned by an attractive Palestinian woman, and soon Zohan is bringing in the money by offering his female clientele services beyond perms and blue rinses.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston.(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future. With the aid of fellow mutant Domino and five less lucky teammates, they attempt to defeat the villainous Cable. Action comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz.(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside town's tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chief's efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielberg's thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: T'Challa, the new ruler of a hidden African nation, faces a challenge for his throne in the form of his cousin, Erik 'Killmonger' Stevens. Assisted by his tribe's forces and CIA agent Everett K Ross, T'Challa is soon locked in a life-or-death struggle for the future of the world. Marvel's comic-book adventure, starring Chadwick Boseman, Michael B Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o and Martin Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: When galactic warlord Thanos attempts to obtain powerful stones to execute an insane plan, the Avengers and their allies join forces to stop him. Fantasy adventure, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth, Josh Brolin and Benedict Cumberbatch.(n)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future. With the aid of fellow mutant Domino and five less lucky teammates, they attempt to defeat the villainous Cable. Action comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz.(n)

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Demon
programme.desc: A bridegroom is possessed by a spirit in the midst of his own wedding celebration. Comedy horror, starring Itay Tiran, Agnieszka Zulewska and Andrzej Grabowski. In Polish.(n)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: An ageing British rock band try to revive their fortunes by embarking on a US tour, with a film-maker on hand to record the mayhem. However, the big comeback soon turns into a series of disasters as tensions between the clueless rockers and their long-suffering manager reach breaking point. Spoof documentary, starring Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner.(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: The High Frontier
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage sons travel to a mountain cabin for an adventure. However, when a mysterious stranger arrives at the residence, their outing turns into a struggle for survival. Thriller, starring Bartosz Bielenia, Janusz Chabior and Andrzej Chyra.(n)

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.(n)

programme.title: Who We Are Now
programme.desc: An ex-con tries to win back custody of her son with the help of an idealistic young public defender, and at the same time falls into a romantic fling with a traumatised former US soldier. Drama, starring Julianne Nicholson, Zachary Quinto, Jess Weixler and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A thief takes a bank manager hostage while he and his gang make their getaway, only to later learn she lives in the same neighbourhood as him. As FBI agents close in, he tries to befriend her to make sure she cannot identify him, but as he falls in love with her, he considers changing his ways - risking the fury of his unstable partner in crime. Drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck. With Rebecca Hall and Jeremy Renner.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: In a future plagued with overpopulation, a man realises he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall. Alexander Payne's sci-fi comedy, starring Matt Damon and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Thoroughbreds
programme.desc: Two upper-class Connecticut teenagers rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart, and hatch a plan to solve their problems, no matter what the cost. Comedy crime drama, starring Olivia Cooke, Anya Taylor-Joy and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 2
programme.desc: After eight years as Father Christmas, divorced dad Scott Calvin has settled nicely into the role. He is looking forward to another season when he discovers that a clause in his contract means he has to find a wife by Christmas Eve. Disney comedy adventure sequel, with Tim Allen, Elizabeth Mitchell, Judge Reinhold, Spencer Breslin and Eric Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Pirate Fairy
programme.desc: A rebellious fairy steals the magic pixie dust that grants her people the power of flight and runs away, becoming captain of a band of pirates. Tinker Bell and her friends set off to recover the dust, but succumb to a spell that switches their magical powers. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Christina Hendricks and Tom Hiddleston.(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Princess Mia of Genovia discovers that although she is supposed to take the throne on her 21st birthday, unmarried women like her are barred from being head of state. She now has just 30 days to find herself a husband - but an ambitious nobleman is determined to sabotage her hopes of romance. Family comedy sequel, with Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, John Rhys-Davies and Chris Pine.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Lion King 3: Hakuna Matata
programme.desc: Firm friends and unlikely heroes Timon and Pumbaa set out to retell the tale of young lion Simba from their perspective - and end up revealing how they met and grew up to become such lovable rogues in the first place. Animated adventure, with the voices of Nathan Lane, Ernie Sabella, Julie Kavner and Matthew Broderick.(n)

programme.title: Lion King II: Simba's Pride
programme.desc: Simba's daughter Kiara befriends a lion cub named Kovu - unaware he is the heir of a banished pride of lions that followed the evil Scar. Sequel to the animated movie, with the voices of Matthew Broderick, Neve Campbell and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Muppets Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Muppets prepare to head off on a world tour, unaware that Kermit has been replaced by an evil genius who is his exact double. As the dastardly interloper uses the gang's performances as cover for an international crime spree, the real Kermit is left languishing in a Russian prison. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Princess Mia of Genovia discovers that although she is supposed to take the throne on her 21st birthday, unmarried women like her are barred from being head of state. She now has just 30 days to find herself a husband - but an ambitious nobleman is determined to sabotage her hopes of romance. Family comedy sequel, with Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, John Rhys-Davies and Chris Pine.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.(n)

His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.(n)

programme.title: Mars Needs Moms
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy sees a spacecraft land and kidnap his mother. He stows away on board as the ship travels back to the aliens' Mars homeland. As he tries to rescue her, he learns the Martians have taken her because they need Earth mothers to raise their own children. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Seth Robert Dusky, Dan Fogler and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: The Scooby gang try to save an old movie studio, which is not only threatened by developers, but a series of movie monsters too. Animated adventure, with the voices of Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard and Grey Griffin.(n)

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: A 13-year-old vampire's clan is threatened by a notorious hunter, but thankfully the youngster has help from a fellow teenager. Animated adventure, with the voice of Rasmus Hardiker, Amy Saville and Jim Carter.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: The Scooby gang try to save an old movie studio, which is not only threatened by developers, but a series of movie monsters too. Animated adventure, with the voices of Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard and Grey Griffin.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Shy bridegroom Victor unintentionally gets himself hitched to a ghostly bride, who lures him down into the netherworld. But as he strives to find his way back to the land of the living, a treacherous aristocrat is scheming to marry Victor's flesh-and-blood fiancee. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Christopher Lee and Richard E Grant.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: A widow boards a plane with her daughter and promptly falls asleep. When she wakes up, the girl has disappeared - and the mother's fear turns to outright panic when the aircraft crew insists she boarded the flight alone, suggesting the child is merely a figment of her distressed imagination. Thriller, starring Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean and Greta Scacchi.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safety-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Black Hole
programme.desc: An intergalactic research team is lulled into a false sense of security by a mad scientist planning to explore a collapsed star - and attacked by his army of deadly androids. Sci-fi adventure, starring Maximilian Schell, Anthony Perkins and Ernest Borgnine, with Roddy McDowall providing the voice of the heroes' robot companion.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk and his crew hijack the decommissioned Enterprise to recover the body of their fallen comrade Mr Spock from the planet Genesis. Kirk has learnt that Spock's spirit is still alive, and the Vulcan can be resurrected, but he must also battle a Klingon captain determined to control the planet's mysterious energy. Sci-fi sequel, directed by Leonard Nimoy, with William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The Starship Enterprise races to the rescue of intergalactic ambassadors held hostage on a distant planet. The crisis proves to be the handiwork of a renegade Vulcan mystic who kidnaps Captain Kirk and his crew, ordering them to fly to an unexplored world where he hopes to fulfil his insane ambition - to meet God. Sci-fi adventure, written, directed by and starring William Shatner, with Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.desc: Captain Kirk is framed for the assassination of the Klingon head of state just as the Federation is about to make peace with their old enemies. As Kirk and Dr McCoy are banished to an icy prison planet, Spock tries to uncover the identity of the real killers. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, Christopher Plummer, with appearances by Christian Slater and Michael Dorn from Star Trek: The Next Generation.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Generations
programme.desc: USS Enterprise Captain Jean-Luc Picard must stop a deranged genius obsessed with gaining access to a mysterious energy source - regardless of the threat to entire civilisations that lie in his path. Help arrives from an unlikely quarter - his supposedly long dead predecessor Captain James T Kirk. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell and Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise face their deadliest enemies, the Borg, who travel back in time in an attempt to change Earth's history. The starship follows on a mission to foil their plan, but the vessel is taken over by members of the cyborg collective, leaving Picard consumed by a desire for revenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, James Cromwell and Alice Krige.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: Captain Picard and the Enterprise crew uncover a conspiracy by their own superiors and a sinister alien race to take over a peaceful world and exploit its power to prolong life. However, the crew is forced to defy Federation orders and turns renegade to protect the planet's inhabitants. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, F Murray Abraham, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner and Michael Dorn.(n)

programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League - Cosmic Clash
programme.desc: The superhero team battles a super-intelligent robot villain plotting to take over the world. Before they can put a stop to his evil schemes, he transports the members of the league through time to different points in history. Only Batman and the Flash avoid this fate, and must find a way to bring their team-mates back to the present. Animated adventure, with the voices of Nolan North and Troy Baker.(n)

programme.title: Lego Batman: The Movie - DC Super Heroes Unite
programme.desc: When the Joker and Lex Luthor form an alliance, Batman must team up with the Justice League in order to stop them. Animated adventure, with the voices of Clancy Brown, Troy Baker and Christopher Corey Smith.(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Batman has drifted into isolated retirement years after helping to rid Gotham of organised crime. He is lured into returning to duty by an encounter with an enigmatic thief, but his investigation leads to a far greater threat - the leader of a terrorist army planning to seize control of the city. Conclusion of Christopher Nolan's comic-book thriller trilogy, with Christian Bale, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: Batman: Gotham Knight
programme.desc: Premiere. Action-packed animated adventure pitting the avenger of Gotham City against dangerous villains Scarecrow, Killer Croc and Deadshot. Violent scenes/flashing images.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Lego Batman: The Movie - DC Super Heroes Unite
programme.desc: When the Joker and Lex Luthor form an alliance, Batman must team up with the Justice League in order to stop them. Animated adventure, with the voices of Clancy Brown, Troy Baker and Christopher Corey Smith.(n)

programme.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated adventure featuring an alternate reality where Wonder Woman and Aquaman are at war, and there is no Superman. Can The Flash put things right?(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Batman has drifted into isolated retirement years after helping to rid Gotham of organised crime. He is lured into returning to duty by an encounter with an enigmatic thief, but his investigation leads to a far greater threat - the leader of a terrorist army planning to seize control of the city. Conclusion of Christopher Nolan's comic-book thriller trilogy, with Christian Bale, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
programme.desc: A burnt-out British spy is ordered to venture undercover in East Germany. He begins by faking his resignation and subsequent alcoholic depression to dupe the enemy into trusting him, but, as he becomes further embroiled in his mission, he comes to realise that he is merely a pawn. Espionage thriller, based on John Le Carre's novel, starring Richard Burton, Claire Bloom, Oskar Werner and Peter Van Eyck.(n)

programme.title: The Favourite Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Emma Stone, Olivia Colman and Rachel Weisz and director Yorgos Lanthimos talk about making the period comedy drama, set in the early 18th century in the court of Queen Anne.(n)

programme.title: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the sinking of the Titanic, told from the point of view of the ship's second officer as he struggles to get as many passengers and crew off the vessel before it sinks. Meanwhile, the captain of a nearby vessel embarks on a doomed rescue mission. Starring Kenneth More, Honor Blackman, Ronald Allen, Tucker McGuire and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: Fighting with My Family Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Stephen Merchant and stars Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden and Nick Frost talk about making the comedy drama based on a real family of wrestlers from Norwich.(n)

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: A courageous American colonel with a never-say-die attitude is held in a PoW camp. He boldly sets out to lead a group of Allied prisoners in a daring mass escape bid by hijacking a freight train and fleeing through occupied Italy to Switzerland. Second World War action adventure, starring Frank Sinatra, Trevor Howard, Brad Dexter and James Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Us Interview Special
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jordan Peele and stars Lupita Nyong'o and Winston Duke talk about making the new horror-thriller US, the follow-up to the director's acclaimed first film, Get Out.(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: Us Interview Special
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jordan Peele and stars Lupita Nyong'o and Winston Duke talk about making the new horror-thriller US, the follow-up to the director's acclaimed first film, Get Out.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q.(n)

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: A grieving couple are visited by a stranger, who claims to have been in the army with their dead son. They invite him to move in with them, and he proves a welcome addition to the household - but his arrival coincides with an outbreak of violent incidents that raise suspicions that he is not what he seems to be. Thriller, starring Dan Stevens and Maika Monroe.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A new arrival in town encourages the farmers to invest in a new form of corn. However, when he has an accident and does not come home, they think they have been cheated.

programme.title: Have A Little Faith
programme.desc: Writer Mitch Alboms reluctantly agrees to pen the eulogy of his childhood rabbi. Biographical drama, starring Laurence Fishburne, Bradley Whitford and Anika Noni Rose.

programme.title: Proof of Lies
programme.desc: A dedicated scientist carrying out research into the genetic cause of addictive behaviour seems on the verge of a ground-breaking discovery - until a break-in at her lab makes her suspect she has become caught up in a conspiracy motivated by greed. Thriller, starring Amanda Detmer, Jonathan Scarfe and Anthony Lemke.

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Five teenagers united by an obsession with celebrity steal from the houses of the rich and famous stars they idolise, using the internet to follow their targets' movements. When the police finally catch up with them, the arrest brings a taste of the fame they have craved. Fact-based drama, starring Emma Watson and Israel Broussard.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura is attracted to a new boy in school, but Nellie is equally keen on him, and plans to ruin their romance.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary enters a state-wide maths competition, but Charles can't afford to pay the travel expenses necessary for her to compete. The entire town council foots the bill, taking great pride in her, but this causes Mary to worry she will let them down. American Western drama, starring Melissa Sue Anderson.

programme.title: A Killer in the Family
programme.desc: A killer manages to con his three sons into helping him and his cellmate escape from prison - a move which lands them in the middle of a murder spree. Thriller based on a true story, starring Robert Mitchum, James Spader and Eric Stoltz.

programme.title: Daddy's Girl
programme.desc: A landscape gardener finally finds new romance 10 years after his wife walked out - but as a result, his teenage daughter begins to suffer recurring nightmares about the night her mum disappeared. Turning to the police for help, she claims a murder has taken place, and a full investigation into the case begins - but suspicions remain that she is merely manipulating her dad. Drama, starring Martin Kemp.

programme.title: Fatal Trust
programme.desc: A widow returns to the small town where she grew up to recover from her grief at the loss of her husband, and gets a job as a secretary to the local doctor. She becomes suspicious about the surprising number of patients who die after treatment, and becomes convinced the seemingly kind medic is poisoning them. Crime drama, starring Amy Jo Johnson and David Haydn-Jones.

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.
